title: Massive problem with launching league.
body:
I was playing an urf game and, after it ended, i did'nt wait for the stats. This caused league to crash. Now the provlem is i can't open the client. It gives me these messages repetedly:
"We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version." [OKAY]
"There was a problem patching league of legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after you restart the patcher." [RESTART]
I cant get out of theis loop. Please help.

replies.body: This installation patching error should be resolved now.  Are you still having this issue?
The issue seems to no longer occur, and it didn't occur yesterday at about 8 EST. I'll let you know if I have any further problems.
it happened to me just now and was able to get into the game but could not ban in champ select, then it wont let me pick a champ either in a different game..

Ya is happeninng to me as well
[Here](https://gyazo.com/ae6aaa1bb004e0654d2d35755cabba1c)
and 
[here](https://gyazo.com/54221ebfda309ad44e26949bfc4dd89a)

it just gets into an endless loop and you can only close league with task manager

This client has just been really buggy. Been getting more crashes, more issues with loot and collection not loading. We just have to wait now until the problem is fixed before we can play again.
